name: UpdateAccessGroup
description:
Update metadata for an access group.

Use this tool to update the metadata of a specified access group by its ID or name. This is helpful when you need to modify access controls or group settings.

parameters.name: access_group_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the access group to update. Use either the unique identifier or the group's name to specify which access group you want to modify.

parameters.name: access_group_update_data
parameters.description: JSON object with details about the access group update, including the group name, projects with roles, members to add, and members to remove.

name.description: The name of the access group

role.description: The project role that will be added to this Access Group. \"null\" will remove this project level role.

membersToAdd.description: List of members to add to the access group.

membersToRemove.description: List of members to remove from the access group.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the team on whose behalf the request is performed.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The identifier for the team, used to perform the request on its behalf.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

name.description: The name of the access group

role.description: The project role that will be added to this Access Group. \"null\" will remove this project level role.

membersToAdd.description: List of members to add to the access group.

membersToRemove.description: List of members to remove from the access group.
